title: Edit and Continue
body:
This feature would add the ability to edit JavaScript code when stopped in the debugger then to continue (or step) and execute the modified code.

Proposed Design
- Will have a number of limitations (e.g. not applicable to eval code)
- Will not modify the state of the DOM/Objects/Closures etc.

comments.body: Any updates on this? This has been ongoing work for 1+ years by now...
It would be great to have code completion and intellisense on certain popular library APIs such as AngularJS, jQuery,... when editing code while in debug mode.
Yes please. can sort of do it by setting function variables equal to other function strings in the console (same on FF)
